pages.text: So! Liroth finally has a tutorial book! Woopee!! So, let's start, first, it seems you've already found a Liroth Gem and combined it with the book to create this here Tutorial Book, good!

The Tutorial Book Recipe above, don't know why I put it here considering you already knew the recipe from your intellegence to actually combine the two in the first place, why am I still rambling, why aren't I just letting you get to the tutorial... help!

So yeah! Welcome to the Liroth Mod! The mod has been overdue for a tutorial book for quite some time now... and through a little looking up, it seems that Patchouli is extremely easy to use because it uses only JSONs! Which is nice. $(br2)Also, you can call me $(l)$(#f00)L$(), your sarcastic yet sometimes idiotic assistant! See any misspellings?? May be on purpose, may just be me being an idiot!
